languages.text: "Естественно. Ее Светлость оказала мне неоценимую услугу, взяв на себя наведение порядка на станции. Хотя мне ее манера управления кажется излишне жесткой, в целом ее действия не выходили за пределы установленных мной рамок".

"Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
languages.original_text: "Естественно. Ее Светлость оказала мне неоценимую услугу, взяв на себя наведение порядка на станции. Хотя мне ее манера управления кажется излишне жесткой, в целом ее действия не выходили за пределы установленных мной рамок".

traits.locale_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems excessively brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems excessively brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems excessively brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我自然了解。因森蒂娅女士为我提供了宝贵的服务，在那座星站建立起了秩序。尽管在我看来，她的领导风格有些过于粗暴，不是很有必要，但总体而言，她的行为并没有超出我规定的界限。”
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."

traits.locale_text: “我自然了解。因森蒂娅女士为我提供了宝贵的服务，在那座星站建立起了秩序。尽管在我看来，她的领导风格有些过于粗暴，但总体而言，她的行为并没有超出我规定的界限。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Naturalmente. Milady me ha hecho un favor de valor incalculable al instaurar el orden en la estación. Si bien su estilo de liderazgo me parece de una brutalidad innecesaria, el conjunto de sus acciones no supera los límites que le he impuesto».
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente. Milady me ha hecho un favor de valor incalculable al instaurar el orden en la estación. Si bien su estilo de liderazgo me parece de una brutalidad excesiva, el conjunto de sus acciones no supera los límites que le he impuesto».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「当然だ。陛下はこのステーションで秩序を教え込むという重要な責務を果たしてくれていた。その統率方法は私にしてみれば過激に過ぎるとしても、全体として、彼女の行いは私の設定した一線を越えてはいない」
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."

traits.locale_text: 「当然だ。陛下はこのステーションで秩序を教え込むという重要な責務を果たしてくれていた。その統率方法は私にしてみれば過激に過ぎるとしても、全体として、彼女の行いは私の設定した一線を越えてはいない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Bien entendu. Sa Seigneurie m'a rendu un immense service en se chargeant de remettre de l'ordre dans la station. Bien que sa façon de gouverner me paraisse excessivement brutale, dans l'ensemble, elle a su respecter les limites que je lui avais imposées. »
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."

traits.locale_text: « Bien entendu. Sa Seigneurie m'a rendu un immense service en se chargeant de remettre de l'ordre dans la station. Bien que sa façon de gouverner me paraisse excessivement brutale, dans l'ensemble, elle a su respecter les limites que je lui avais imposées. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Natürlich. Ihre Ladyschaft hat mir einen unbezahlbaren Dienst erwiesen, indem sie die Aufgabe übernommen hat, auf der Station für Ordnung zu sorgen. Ich finde ihren Führungsstil zwar unnötig brutal, aber insgesamt hat sie die Grenzen nicht überschritten, die ich ihr gesetzt hatte."
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Ihre Ladyschaft hat mir einen unbezahlbaren Dienst erwiesen, indem sie die Aufgabe übernommen hat, auf der Station für Ordnung zu sorgen. Ich finde ihren Führungsstil zwar übertrieben brutal, aber insgesamt hat sie die Grenzen nicht überschritten, die ich ihr gesetzt hatte."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Tabii. Leydi Hazretleri, istasyonda düzeni sağlama vazifesini üstlenerek bana paha biçilemez bir hizmette bulundu. Gerçi önderlik tarzı bana göre aşırı gaddar ama yaptıkları, belirlediğim sınırları genel anlamda aşmış değil."
languages.original_text: "Naturally. Her Ladyship has done me an invaluable service by taking on the task of instilling order on the station. Though her style of leadership seems unnecessarily brutal to me, on the whole her actions have not exceeded the bounds I set."
